maxram.name: Max RAM (MB)
maxram.description: Maximum amount of RAM that Minecraft will be able to use

minram.name: Min RAM (MB)
minram.description: Minimal (initial) amount of RAM that Minecraft will be able to use

screenwidth.name: Screen width
screenwidth.description: Window width when the game launches

screenheight.name: Screen height
screenheight.description: Window height when the game launches

detached.name: Detach Minecraft from launcher
detached.description: If enabled, you'll be able to close the launcher without closing Minecraft.

404.p: Choose a page from the left side.

modpack.title: Modpack type
modpack.description: Hover over a button to see description.
modpack.onboardingextra: This choice can be changed later.

ful.title: Full install
ful.description:
Install everything without exception. Recommended type for most players.

For average/powerful PCs.

min.title: Minimal install
min.description:
Install only Minecraft, essential and optimization mods.

For weak PCs.

ess.title: Only essential
ess.description:
Only install Minecraft and a few essential mods.

Does NOT include optimization mods.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: Agree to server rules to play

respect.title: Treat everyone with respect
respect.content: We do not tolerate bullying or harassment, in any way, shape or form. All members of our community should be treated with dignity and respect.

integrity.title: Play with integrity
integrity.content: Fair gameplay is core to the experience. Progression is earned through good, clean gameplay. Cheating, griefing or other threats to fair play will not be tolerated.

vigilant.title: Stay vigilant
vigilant.content: Working tagether we can keep the game fair and fun for all. To promote an enjoyable gameplay experience, report any incidents or inappropriate behaviors you encounter to moderation staff.

buttons.logs: Open last log in default editor

debug.title: Pre-alpha release
debug.description: If you experience any issues with the launcher or have any suggestions for improvements, please let the developer know by clicking the button in the window header.

startedoffline.title: No connection!
startedoffline.description: Seems like you don't have internet connection. Some features might not work.

gotoffline.title: No connection!
gotoffline.description: Seems like you got offline. Some features might stop working.

gotonline.title: You're online!
gotonline.description: Internet is back, all features are now working.

nolog.title: Error!
nolog.description: Unable to view latest log. There's no file.

nogamedir.title: Error!
nogamedir.description: Unable to open game directory. There's no directory.

login-error-401.title: Failed to log in!
login-error-401.description: Seems like your credentials are incorrect. Try again.

update-error-nofile.title: No update file
update-error-nofile.description: Failed to find installer file in update. Please report this to developer.
